# buildmotion-logging

The latest version v2.0.x is using the Angular 5.x packages. 

```json
"devDependencies": {
    "@angular/cli": "^1.5.0",
    "@angular/compiler": "^5.0.1",
    "@angular/compiler-cli": "^5.0.1",
    "@angular/core": "^5.0.1",
    "rollup": "^0.50.0",
    "tslint": "4.5.1",
    "typescript": "^2.4.2",
    "uglify-js": "^3.1.10"
  }
```
